Classes module¶

class src.classes.Alignment(score, query_seq, template_name, template_seq)[source]¶
class Alignment¶
This class groups informations about an alignment.
score¶

Alignment score

query_seq¶

Query sequence

template¶

Instance of a Template object as Template(template_name, template_seq)

class src.classes.Residue(name)[source]¶
class Residue¶
This class groups informations about a residue.
name¶

Name of the residue (3 letters code)

CA_coords¶

3D coordinates of the residues

class src.classes.Template(name, seq)[source]¶
class Template¶
This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.
name¶

Name of the template

seq¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

pdb¶

PDB code of the template
